short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Loki hates Lightning because of his brother, Thor. Loki will automatically revert a page to Classic when it is opened in Lighning.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When active, this extension reopens a SFDC Lighting Edition page as a SFDC Classic Edition page.
